titles.title: Supporting Apprenticeship Colleges Act of 2020

To authorize funding to expand and support enrollment at institutions of higher education that sponsor construction and manufacturing-oriented registered apprenticeship programs, and for other purposes.
Supporting Apprenticeship Colleges Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary:
Supporting Apprenticeship Colleges Act of 2020
This bill directs the Department of Education to award grants to institutions of higher education that sponsor construction and manufacturing-oriented registered apprenticeship programs for (1) expanding or supporting outreach to high schools, local businesses, and local workforce development boards; and (2) providing academic advising programs and student support services to students who are enrolled in these apprenticeship programs.
